channel.title: Comments on: DiggBar Brings Digg Features To Any Page

item.title: By: Seesmic Desktop Takes Twhirl To The Next Level » Digital Media, Reviews, Web » Russell Heimlich

item.description: [...] shortners include bit.ly, digg.com (with their new DiggBar), is.gd, snurl.com, tr.im, and twurl.nl. You can also post pictures but the only service available [...]
